findings.title: Double Minting of Janis Reward in JanisMinter
findings.description: The `mintReferralsOnly()` function has a flawed implementation where the user reward is incorrectly minted as it mints the `_minting` amount one more time.

findings.title: Implicit Assumption Enforcement In AddLiquidity()
findings.description: In the UniswapV2Router02 contract, the addLiquidity() routine is provided to add amountADesired amount of tokenA and amountBDesired amount of tokenB into the pool as liquidity via the UniswapRouterV2::addLiquidity() routine.
